JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description :    Coding based on Design and Customer requirements, unit and system testing, bugs resolution, participation in UAT with customers, release to customers, interacting with counterparts at customer end, maintaining records of time sheet, following laid down SDLC processes    Qualification :    B-Tech (CSE or IT)/ MCA with minimum 60% marks throughout academic standard.    EXPERIENCE : Freshers    Desired Profile :    - Proficiency in development environment, debugging tools and source control systems    - Ability to understand existing software product code    - Perform unit testing and participate in design and code-review process    - Good communication skills    - Good team player    Essential :    - Knowledge of Core Java, JSP, Servlets and Database
